mapper.select: SELECT course_overview, objective, teaching, book, evaluation, remarks FROM syllabus WHERE id_pgm=#{idPgm}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO syllabus (course_overview, objective, teaching, book, evaluation, remarks, id_prof) VALUES (#{courseOverview}, #{objective}, #{teaching}, #{book}, #{evaluation}, #{remarks}, #{idProf})
mapper.update: UPDATE syllabus SET course_overview =#{courseOverview}, objective =#{objective}, teaching =#{teaching}, book =#{book}, remarks =#{remarks} WHERE id_pgm =#{idPgm}
mapper.select: SELECT id_pgm, cate_name, room_name, pgm_name, st_dt, end_dt, pgm_per, pgm_fee FROM program p JOIN category c ON p.id_cate = c.id_cate JOIN class_room r ON p.id_room = r.id_room WHERE p.id_pgm=#{idPgm}
